properties.name: mode
properties.doc: /** @var string $mode Default SERVER OR CLI or CGI */

properties.name: type
properties.doc: /** @var string $type Request Type Default NORMAL or AJAX or SOAP */

properties.doc: /** @var boolean $isNativeClient true if application embed with browser  */

methods.name: isNativeApp
methods.doc:
/**
     * True if Application run with SphpServer Mode or Browser embed mode 
     * False on Web Server Mode or Console Mode
     * @return boolean
     */

methods.doc:
/**
     * Check if client demand JSON response.
     * @return boolean 
     */

methods.doc:
/**
     * Read Browser Get Method Data
     * @param string $name key
     * @param boolean $blnRaw true mean, no escaping
     * @return string|array
     */

methods.name: post
methods.doc:
/**
     * Read Browser Post Method Data
     * @param string $name key
     * @param boolean $blnRaw true mean, no escaping
     * @return string|array
     */

methods.doc:
/**
     * Check if Request has key
     * @param string $name key
     * @return boolean
     */

methods.name: isCookie
methods.doc:
/**
     * Check if Cookie has key
     * @param string $name key
     * @return boolean
     */

methods.doc:
/**
     * Check if Session has key

/**

/**
     * Check if Post has key

     */

methods.name: isGet
methods.doc:
/**

/**

methods.name: request
methods.doc:
/**
     * Read/Write Request key
     * @param string $name key
     * @param boolean $blnRaw true mean, no escaping at time of reading
     * @param string|array $value null mean read key
     * @return string
     */

methods.name: cookie
methods.doc:
/**
     * Write/Read Cookie
     * @param string $name key
     * @param boolean $blnRaw true mean, no escaping at time of reading
     * @param string|array $value null mean read key
     * @param int $expire
     * @param string $path
     * @param string $domain
     * @param boolean $secure
     * @param boolean $httponly
     * @return string
     */

methods.name: cookie_secure
methods.doc:
/**
     * Write/Read Cookie with tamper protection. Bad cookie return empty value.
     * @param string $name key
     * @param boolean $blnRaw true mean, no escaping at time of reading
     * @param string|array $value null mean read key
     * @param int $expire
     * @param string $path
     * @param string $domain
     * @param boolean $secure
     * @param boolean $httponly
     * @return string
     */

methods.name: session
methods.doc:
/**
     * Read/Write Session key
     * @param string $name key
     * @param string|array $value null mean read key
     * @return string|array
     */
